name: TRANSPORTATION
description: Numerous transportation options exist, ranging from one-way trips in a first-class jet to budget accommodation on a freighter.

name: ACCOMMODATION
description: A hospitality exchange or home stay network is an organization that connects travellers with local residents in the cities they're visiting.

name: MEALS AND DRINKS
description: Food and drink are often the highlights of—if not the reason for—many getaways. Travelers plan journeys around wine regions, exclusive restaurants..

name: ENTERTAINMENT
description: Entertainment Travel is the agency of choice, and has been for more than two decades, providing travel services to the entertainment industry. Bands and their entourages out on tour for 3 months or 3 years rely on ET to ensure privacy, safety and accuracy for their arrangements.

name: INFORMATION
description: Get advice about travelling abroad, including the latest information on coronavirus, safety and security, entry requirements and travel warnings.

name: HOTEL AND RESTAURANT
description: Plan your next trip, read reviews and get travel advice from our community ... book the perfect tour or attraction, and reserve a table at the best restaurants.
